name: TFS Kanban buddy
tagline: Powerfull Kanban enhancement for Microsoft Team Foundation Server
body:
###Welcome to TFS Kanban Buddy
This is a Chrome Extension that adds some pretty powerful features to TFS around the Task and Backlog/Kanban boards without the need to change anything in tfs itself all the functionality is client side. This started out as crude Userscripts and has over time grown into a full fledged configurable Chrome extension. As of 2015-05-08 we have 280 users most in the mother organisation where development originated but about 100 users are outside.

### Features
* Configurable coloring of TFS Tickets on Kanban board and Task board.
* Filtering by category of tickets on the Kanban board based on naming convention
* Freetext Filtering of tickets on the Kanban Board
* Highlighting of related tickets based on naming convention.
* Highlighting dates in titles
* Custom configurable Links in TFS to make n navigation easier.
* Share configuration for the whole team.
* Automatic Board data collecion.
* CFD based on collected data
* Cycle time calculation based on collected data.
* Flow report showing when Tickets has been in a certain lane
* Flow data grid showing total duration in different states
* Snapshot show in the current state of the tickets and for how long time it has been in the current state

 Current version works with TFS 2013 on premise and TFS online.
 
 There is an older version available that works with TFS 2012.
 
### Card Colors

1. Here we have 3 tickets with titles starting with `CR` `MA`and `BUG` ![3 plain tickets](images/3plainTickets.png)
2. Open the config Page ![](images/icon.png)
3. Enter `CR` `MA`and `BUG` on one color each (adding two prefixes separated with ; `Bug;BUG` enables two prefixes to give the same color ![](images/colorConfig.png)
4. Go to the board again and refresh and the tickets will be colored ![](images/3coloredTickets.png)
